message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I can offer $120 for it.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. I can offer $125 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go slightly lower than my previous offer, but not that much. I'll meet you at $132.50. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. I can offer $128 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $130, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. I can offer $127.50 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $129.50. It's my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it reasonable.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to make one last offer. I can offer $127 for the product.
